title: How do trends affect society? - Quora

response.answer_text: The trends in society are the massive favor towards a particular thought, fashion, ideology or market. This happens due to various factors like a stand taken by a political leader, repetition of unfortunate events, attacks on an element of society or due to an advertisement done via television and internet. Most trends that easy to pick are monetary. The trends of stock exchange are supposed to be up and down at times. But for common man they do not incidentally affecting to the society unless the trend has become permanent for a particular time period. Fashion world is mostly governed by youth and it can affect the society in terms of values. A traditional society may not be as open to changes in cloths pattern as it is supposed by youth. Fashions are made to change. So, unless there are any very serious value-indiscipline done by a fashion, it is taken lightly and often taken for granted.
